title: BitGoba
author: BitGoba
content: Undead Blocks is a play-to-earn multiplayer FPS zombie survival crypto game. Players can fight their way through hordes of zombies using special NFT weapons & earn ZBUX, the Undead Blocks reward currency, as they progress through easter-egg filled maps. Undead Blocks has over 140 unique weapons & explosives already created. Full game launching in Q4 2022.https://www.undeadblocks.com/UNDEAD tokenhttps://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/undead-blocksUNDEAD token can be staked for 6,9, or 12 month periods to earn %APY returns rewarded in additional $UNDEAD token upon completion of the staking period.By staking a defined minimum quantity of $UNDEAD token in one of the staking pools, a free NFT or in-game item will be minted immediately upon staking of token and will be added to the wallet of the staker for immediate useLoot CoffinsUndead Blocks Loot Coffins are available to be purchased at a discount using $UNDEAD token. Â Any Loot Coffins purcahsed with $UNDEAD token is burned by periodically sending the $UNDEAD to a burn wallet.Burn, $UNDEAD, BurnEvery single in-game purchase made with $UNDEAD token is immediately burned. Â You heard that correctly, whether someone buys a Loot Coffin in $UNDEAD token, purchases a limited edition skin using $UNDEAD token, or another in-game item purchase with $UNDEAD token, that token is immediately burned. Â What this means for the token is that by just holding $UNDEAD, the value of your holdings may increase with every $UNDEAD token that is burned to decrease the circulating supply. Â With several games to come in the future under the Wagyu Games umbrella, and many games developed using WagyuOS, $UNDEAD burn will accumulate in a large way over the next few years. Â $UNDEAD is burned by periodically sending all $UNDEAD tokens used for in-game purchases to a burn wallet. Â Burn statistics will be posted weekly.GovernanceWagyu Games will be implementing a raw voting system with weight based on $UNDEAD holdings. Holders of $UNDEAD will be able to vote on matters such as, but not excluded to:Incorporating future Weapon Loadouts into the ecosystemFuture map and game modesPotential rewards for $UNDEAD token holders dependent on performance and sustainabilityThe Halloween Bash is FREE to play and earn to the public, no NFT required!

The graphics are amazingThis is a beta full game coming for ChristmasPlay to earn mod is only for 6000 NFT owners .Gold ZBUX is a stable in-game reward currency not UNDEAD token.Gold ZBUX is pegged at $0.10 (off chain currency)In free game mode, players earn green zbux Green ZBUX Uses:Upgrading Weapon Loadouts to higher levels of performancePurchasing Loot Coffin Â NFT weapons skins, and Â NFT character skinsIn every Undead Blocks Loot Coffin contains a special Undead Blocks game reward item. Â Most items obtained through a Loot Coffin are weapon or character skins, and can be traded on the secondary marketplace. Â Each weapon skin has a varying rarity and chance of being pulled out of a Loot Coffin, and each one has a fixed limited supply. Â This means that as time passes, each skin gets more rare. Loot Coffins can be purchased for any cryptocurrecy equivalent of $10.99 USD.Â It can also be purchased with 110 Gold ZBUX. Â Finally, get a discount by purchasing 1 Loot Coffin for $9.99 worth of $UNDEAD Token. Â To strengthen the Undead Blocks ecosystem, all $UNDEAD Token used to purchase Loot Coffins are periodically Burned, creating a deflationary currency.
